text: Ara amara ratake ebam dinake baniyechi duti nidarsana, kaje'i ratera nidarsanake amara muche pheli, ara dinera nidarsanake bana'i sudrsya yena tomara tomadera prabhura kacha theke karunabhandara anbesana karate para, ara yena tomara bacharera ganana o hisaba janate para. Ara saba-kichu'i amara barnana karechi bisadabhabe.
